questions.question_text: In Episode Review, what is the result of clicking an episode’s Acknowledge button?

choices.D: Change status from New to Acknowledged and assign the current user as owner.
choices.C: Change status from New to In Progress and assign the current user as owner.
choices.B: Change status from New to Acknowledged.
choices.A: Assign the current user as owner.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Acknowledge the episode (status: In Progress owner: you)
Answer should be C - New to In-Progress

Selected Answer: D
D is correct.

Selected Answer: D
D is the correct answer

questions.question_text: Which glass table feature can be used to toggle displaying KPI values from more than one service on a single widget?

discussion.content: Definitely not C and D , A doesn't seems to be best practice , B should be the closes options

Selected Answer: B
B is correct
Could someone please verify the accuracy of this answer

choices.C: The fewer KPIs that share a common base search, the more efficiency a base search provides, and anomaly detection is more efficient.
choices.B: It is possible to filter to entities assigned to the service for calculating the metrics for the service’s KPIs.
choices.A: Search expression, entity splitting rules, and thresholds are configured at the base search level.
choices.D: The base search will execute whether or not a KPI needs it.
